dev_ref: Any keys labelled 'dev_ref' are development notes that will be removed once its no longer needed or before release

files.desc: Files to import. These files will have the same JSON structure as this file, if not then set to_nest (eg: data/), types: new_data_only, overwrite_item, overwrite_array or new_store.

add_new.dev_ref: This contains arrays that are duplicated when creating a new item and adjusted accordingly before being inserted.

types.desc: Defines all supported data types for various components, used when creating custom columns.

column_types.name: Text
column_types.desc: A standard, single-line text input for short strings (e.g., names, short notes, single words).

column_types.name: Paragraph
column_types.desc: A multi-line text area used for long-form content, paragraphs, or detailed descriptions.

column_types.name: Switch
column_types.desc: A binary toggle (True/False, Yes/No) used for simple flags or checks.

column_types.name: Number
column_types.desc: A numerical input field for integers or decimals, typically used for quantities, years, or counts.

column_types.name: Date
column_types.desc: A date and/or time picker for tracking specific moments in time.

column_types.name: Array of Objects
column_types.desc: A flexible, repeatable group of fields used to create lists of complex items (e.g., a list of files, notes, or sub-items).

column_types.name: File URL
column_types.desc: A specialized field for links to files, often used for internal asset management or file uploads.

column_types.name: Web URL
column_types.desc: A field for external web links or resource URLs.

column_types.name: Dropdown Select
column_types.desc: A list of predefined options allowing the user to select one choice from a set (uses Array Presets).

column_types.name: Image URL
column_types.desc: A specialized URL field for images, often with a built-in preview feature.

column_types.name: Icon Picker
column_types.desc: Allows a user to select a symbolic icon (e.g., emoji or library icon) for a visual indicator.

column_types.name: Linked Items
column_types.desc: A list of items dynamically linked from another table or structure. Used for one-to-many relationships (e.g., Songs on an Album).

data_link_types.name: Match Link
data_link_types.desc: Returns a list of matching items from the linked table. Used for creating relationship links.

data_link_types.name: Count Total
data_link_types.desc: Returns a number representing how many items in the linked table match the criteria.

data_link_types.name: Confirm Existence
data_link_types.desc: Returns a boolean (True/False) indicating if at least one item matching the criteria exists in the linked table.

categories.name: General
categories.desc: Default category for items that don't fit specific domains.

categories.name: Core Data
categories.desc: Essential entities required for the main function of a structure (e.g., songs, artists, movies).

categories.name: 3rd Party Entities
categories.desc: External entities or platforms (e.g., accounts, labels, websites).

categories.name: People
categories.desc: Items related to individuals or groups (e.g., cast, crew, users).

categories.name: Media
categories.desc: Items focused on visual or audio assets (e.g., art, files, videos).

categories.name: Events
categories.desc: Items related to scheduled or historical occurrences (e.g., releases, exhibitions).

categories.name: Miscellaneous
categories.desc: Items that are non-essential or highly variable.

tags.name: Default
tags.desc: A general tag indicating system or default content.

tags.name: Example
tags.desc: Content used purely for demonstration or reference.

tags.name: Music
tags.desc: Related to audio production or release.

tags.name: Visual
tags.desc: Related to image or video assets.

tags.name: Social
tags.desc: Related to social media or web platforms.

tags.name: Post-Production
tags.desc: Related to final stages of creation (e.g., mixing, mastering, publishing).

tags.name: Internal
tags.desc: Content managed exclusively within the application.

presets.dev_ref: All complete, reusable items (Structures, Sections, Tables, Columns, Arrays) must be fully defined here.

sections.name: Music
sections.desc: Add your music, artists and albums here

sections.name: Galleries
sections.desc: Track and manage art, artists, and exhibitions.

sections.name: Accounts
sections.desc: Manage your social media accounts and websites.

tables.name: Labels
tables.desc: Log each label you use and then assigns items to them.

tables.name: Songs
tables.desc: Tracks detailed information for individual songs.

tables.name: Artists
tables.desc: A list of all artists associated with your productions.

tables.name: Movies
tables.desc: Tracks key details about film projects.

columns.name: Title
columns.desc: The primary name or title for the data item.

columns.name: Name
columns.desc: The proper or formal name of a person, entity, or object.

columns.name: Status
columns.desc: The current production stage of the song.

columns.name: Album(s)
columns.desc: Links the song to one or more albums or EPs.

columns.name: Artist(s)
columns.desc: Links to artists involved in the song, including their role.

columns.name: Files
columns.desc: Collection of various downloadable or reference files (e.g., masters, stems).

columns.name: Account
columns.desc: Links the song to a specific platform or social account.

columns.name: Art
columns.desc: Collection of visual assets (cover art, concept art, promotional images).

columns.name: Videos
columns.desc: Collection of video files (e.g., music videos, short promotional clips).

columns.name: Lyrics
columns.desc: The full text content of the song lyrics.

columns.name: Notes
columns.desc: A flexible collection of custom notes and long-form content.

columns.name: Indicators
columns.desc: Customizable list of key flags or markers for the song.

columns.name: Artist(s)
columns.desc: Links the album to its primary and contributing artists.

columns.name: Cover Art
columns.desc: Direct URL link to the official album cover image.

columns.name: Release Year
columns.desc: The year the movie was officially released.

columns.name: Director
columns.desc: The name of the movie's primary director.

columns.name: Status
columns.desc: The production or viewing status of the movie.

columns.name: Platform
columns.desc: The name of the social media or web platform (e.g., 'X', 'Instagram', 'Spotify').

columns.name: Username
columns.desc: The unique handle or username for the account on the platform.

columns.name: Link
columns.desc: The full URL link to the account profile.

arrays.name: Status
arrays.desc: Select the current status of selected item

options.name: Planning
options.desc: The item is currently in the initial planning or conceptual stage.

options.name: Started
options.desc: Work has begun on the item.

options.name: Being worked on
options.desc: The main, active development or production phase is underway.

options.name: Finalizing
options.desc: The item is near completion, focusing on final checks, polish, and preparation for delivery.

options.name: Testing
options.desc: The item is being checked for bugs, quality, or functional errors.

options.name: Complete
options.desc: The item is fully finished and ready for use or release.

arrays.name: Music Production Status
arrays.desc: Select the current production stage of a music item

options.name: Writing
options.desc: Focusing on lyrics, melodies, and composition.

options.name: Recording
options.desc: Capturing vocal and instrument performances.

options.name: Mixing
options.desc: Balancing and blending the recorded tracks (volume, panning, effects).

options.name: Mastering
options.desc: Applying final polish to the mixed track for distribution.

options.name: Finishing
options.desc: Final administrative checks before release.

options.name: Creating cover-art
options.desc: Designing or finalizing the visual album artwork.

options.name: Creating promotional content
options.desc: Developing trailers, short videos, or social media assets.

options.name: Complete
options.desc: The final product is ready for submission or release.

arrays.name: Image Types
arrays.desc: Select the type or purpose of the image asset

options.name: Cover Art
options.desc: The primary image used for the main product.

options.name: Concept Art
options.desc: Early visual development or sketches.

options.name: Fan Art
options.desc: Art created by the community or fans.

options.name: Promotional
options.desc: Imagery used for advertising or marketing purposes.

arrays.name: File Types
arrays.desc: Select the type or purpose of the attached file

options.name: Master Audio File
options.desc: The final, highest-quality version of the audio file.

options.name: Stem/Multi-track Files
options.desc: Individual tracks or grouped elements used for mixing.

options.name: Contract/Legal Document
options.desc: Any formal legal agreement or document.

options.name: Press Kit/Info Sheet
options.desc: A package of promotional materials for media use.

options.name: Miscellaneous
options.desc: Any file that does not fit into other defined categories.

user_data.info: Define Databases and default params to add them on startup if they dont exist already

overrides.desc: Overrides allow you to set your avatars mood and tasks while still begin able to update your user mood and task.

user_defaults.info: This is to be merged with the projects default db and store (Strings are blank, so find default db then default store), if any keys below already exist in project data then leave them as they are.
